resources.string: Activate your practice account using the activation link sent at your email address

Alfalah CLSA Securities is one of the leading pure agency brokers in Pakistan. We occupy a sweet spot being backed by one of the largest banks in Pakistan, Bank Alfalah Limited and, by Asia’s leading Capital Markets & Investment Group, CLSA Limited. Taking advantage of BAFL & CLSA, we provide a full spectrum of services which include Equity Brokerage, Research, Investment Banking, Forex and Money Market.

e-Falah Trade is the online trading platform of Alfalah CLSA Securities, customized for retail and high net-worth investors. Our modern and hassle-free trading system provides Real-time access to the Pakistan Stock Exchange through the internet and allows investors to make direct trades through desktop, web and mobile applications without the intervention of a trader.

Our Research portal provides timely in-depth analysis of companies, industries and economy, Alfalah CLSA has earned its reputation as a leader in the field of research in Pakistan. Please visit our website https://alfalahclsa.com/ for more details.

AFCLSA’s Equity Sales desk is vastly experienced in servicing the entire spectrum of investors including Domestic Institutional Investors including Banks, NBFCs, Employees Benefit Funds, Mutual Funds, Foreign Institutional Investors (“FIIs”), Domestic High Net-Worth Individuals (“HNWIs) and Non-Resident Pakistanis (“NRPs).

AFCLSA, being a pure agency broker with NO proprietary trading book, ensures utmost emphasis on compliance, provides more transparent and efficient order execution to our clients, order security and the highest ethical standards and also offers FIX Connectivity.

string.name: online_trading_platform
string.font: Online trading platform of Alfalah CLSA that delivers timely access to the Pakistan Stock Exchange (PSX) without any geographical constraint. Time is of essence. The quicker the better is what we believe in when it comes to executing trading decisions.
